## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e731f767fbc176f311591d53df23899470fd206206d3f48bd9bbea875e782284)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'search-newfrontier-podlet' @ 3.1.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
